name: The Cube (itch) (Lonely Vertex)
description:
All of a sudden, you encountered a black cube. It looks like it is somehow intelligent and is trying to communicate with you! Can you understand what it wants from you and respond correctly?

How to play

Use your mouse and left mouse button to solve the puzzles presented by the cube.

Credits
  • Jakub Mirosvký
  • Jan Slifka
Acknowledgements

The Cube was created during GDS Game Jam 2021.
